 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SV_BLOCK_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_SV_BLOCK_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 19
 20#include <vsip/core/refcount.hpp>
 21#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 22
 23
 24
 25/***********************************************************************
 26  Declarations
 27***********************************************************************/
 28
 29namespace vsip
 30{
 31
 32namespace impl
 33{
 34
 35
 36
 37template <typename T>
 38class Sv_local_block
 39  : public impl::Ref_count<Sv_local_block<T> >
 40{
 41  // Compile-time values and types.
 42  typedef std::vector<T> vector_type;
 43public:
 44  static dimension_type const dim = 1;
 45
 46  typedef T        value_type;
 47  typedef T&       reference_type;
 48  typedef T const& const_reference_type;
 49
 50  typedef row1_type order_type;
 51  typedef Local_map map_type;
 52
 53  // Implementation types.
 54public:
 55
 56  // Constructors and destructor.
 57public:
 58  Sv_local_block(Domain<1> const& dom, map_type const& = map_type())
 59    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 60    : vector_(dom[0].size())
 61  {}
 62
 63  Sv_local_block(Domain<1> const& dom, T value, map_type const& = map_type())
 64    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 65    : vector_(dom[0].size())
 66  {
 67    for (index_type i=0; i<dom[0].size(); ++i)
 68      this->put(i, value);
 69  }
 70
 71  ~Sv_local_block() VSIP_NOTHROW
 72  {}
 73
 74  // Data accessors.
 75public:
 76  T get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 77  {
 78    assert(idx < size());
 79    return vector_[idx];
 80  }
 81
 82  void put(index_type idx, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW
 83  {
 84    assert(idx < size());
 85    vector_[idx] = val;
 86  }
 87
 88  // Accessors.
 89public:
 90  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 91    { return vector_.size(); }
 92  length_type size(dimension_type D, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 93    { assert(D == 1 && d == 0); return vector_.size(); }
 94
 95  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return map_; }
 96
 97  vector_type const& impl_vector() { return vector_; }
 98
 99  // Hidden copy constructor and assignment.
100private:
101  Sv_local_block(Sv_local_block const&);
102  Sv_local_block& operator=(Sv_local_block const&);
103
104  // Member Data
105private:
106  vector_type vector_;
107  map_type    map_;
108};
109
110
111} // namespace impl
112} // namespace vsip
113
114#endif // VSIP_CORE_SV_BLOCK_HPP
